description: Manage GitHub Projects V2 efficiently by interacting with the GitHub Projects API through a set of powerful tools. Perform project, item, task, field, and view management operations seamlessly from your language model or client. Enhance your workflow with tested, production-ready capabilities for project automation and organization.

capabilities.name: test_connection
capabilities.description: Test GitHub API connection and token validity

capabilities.name: list_projects
capabilities.description: List GitHub Projects (V2) for a user or organization

capabilities.name: create_project
capabilities.description: Create a new GitHub Project (V2) for a user or organization

capabilities.name: toggle_project_archive
capabilities.description: Archive or unarchive a GitHub Project (V2)

capabilities.name: update_project_item
capabilities.description: Update an existing project item in a GitHub Project (V2)

capabilities.name: remove_project_item
capabilities.description: Remove an item from a GitHub Project (V2)

capabilities.name: list_project_fields
capabilities.description: List fields from a GitHub Project (V2)

capabilities.name: list_project_views
capabilities.description: List views from a GitHub Project (V2)

capabilities.name: list_project_items
capabilities.description: List items from a GitHub Project (V2)

capabilities.name: add_project_item
capabilities.description: Add an existing Issue or Pull Request to a GitHub Project (V2)

capabilities.name: create_draft_item
capabilities.description: Create a draft item in a GitHub Project (V2)

capabilities.name: create_project_field
capabilities.description: Create a new field in a GitHub Project (V2)

capabilities.name: create_task
capabilities.description: Create a new task (as draft or real issue) in a GitHub Project (V2)

capabilities.name: manage_task_status
capabilities.description: Update task status and optionally add a comment in a GitHub Project (V2)

capabilities.name: group_tasks
capabilities.description: Group multiple tasks by setting the same field value for all of them in a GitHub Project (V2)

capabilities.name: convert_draft_to_issue
capabilities.description: Convert a draft item to an issue in a GitHub Project (V2)

capabilities.name: get_issue_id
capabilities.description: Get the ID of an issue in a GitHub Project (V2)

capabilities.name: bulk_add_issues
capabilities.description: Bulk add issues to a GitHub Project (V2)
